unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready! The festival season is upon us, and it's looking bigger and better than ever. From the glitz of Cannes to the indie vibes of Sundance, there's something for everyone.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! Film buffs, get ready! The festival season is upon us, and it's looking bigger and better than ever. From the glitz of Cannes to the indie vibes of Sundance, there's something for everyone.

unnormalised: But let's talk about home! The Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition, promising a delectable platter of cinematic experiences. Think *biryani* for the eyes! Early bird registrations are open, so don't miss out.
normalised: But let's talk about home! The Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for its next edition, promising a delectable platter of cinematic experiences. Think biryani for the eyes! Early bird registrations are open, so don't miss out.

unnormalised: And that's not all folks! Keep an eye out for regional gems popping up too. We're talking festivals in Kerala showcasing Malayalam cinema brilliance, and smaller, more intimate events celebrating documentaries and short films from across India.
normalised: And that's not all folks! Keep an eye out for regional gems popping up too. We're talking festivals in Kerala showcasing Malayalam cinema brilliance, and smaller, more intimate events celebrating documentaries and short films from across India.

unnormalised: Imagine: catching a movie, munching on some delicious street food, and maybe even spotting a celebrity or two! It's the perfect excuse to escape the Delhi heat and immerse yourself in the magic of storytelling. Mark your calendars and get ready for some serious movie marathon-ing!
normalised: Imagine: catching a movie, munching on some delicious street food, and maybe even spotting a celebrity or two! It's the perfect excuse to escape the Delhi heat and immerse yourself in the magic of storytelling. Mark your calendars and get ready for some serious movie marathon-ing!
